decision_conditions: The six week evaluation period has expired, the Arboricultural Officer has reviewed this request for these works and the works can be completed as requested to fell the Lime tree that is situated on the curtilage to the right hand driveway.

It is suggested that you engage the services of a qualified and fully insured tree surgeon to carry out the above work on your behalf (you should ask to see the contractor's insurance certificate and make sure that it is up to date).

Please note that if the work for which consent is granted is not carried out within 2 years of the date of this letter, it will be necessary to submit a fresh application if it is intended to implement the work.
description: Removal of Lime Tree.  I am looking to remove the tree that sits on my property at the front of the house so I can carry out works to the driveway of my home.  The removal will make access to the drive in and out easier and much safer.  We currently have to reverse or drive on, which makes it dangerous to reverse off the property as the traffic speeds around the bend 10 metres away from the property.  We generally have issues with speeding traffic on North Road.  This is currently under consultation with the council and highways agency on how this can be improved.  If this request is granted I am happy to plant a tree in the back garden along with the others I have added since living here.
